i2c-1: Start
i2c-1: Read
i2c-1: Address read: 50
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 00
i2c-1: NACK
i2c-1: Start repeat
i2c-1: Write
i2c-1: Address write: 50
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data write: 00
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Start repeat
i2c-1: Read
i2c-1: Address read: 50
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: C0
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: B4
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 04
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 22
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 60
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 00
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 00
i2c-1: ACK
i2c-1: Data read: 00
i2c-1: NACK
i2c-1: Stop
